skilllist.skilldesc: Blessed by the Bear King, Masha has 3 HP bars and won't die until all of them are depleted. She can ignore an instance of damage and remove all Control effects on herself each time she loses an HP bar. When Masha only has two HP bars left, skills will only require 50% of their original HP Cost to cast. When Masha only has one HP bar left, she doesn't need to spend HP to cast skills.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Masha gains <font color="a6aafb">Power of the Wild</font> which causes her Basic Attacks to deal extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 2<font color="fba51f"> (+1% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of the target's Max HP (up to 60 against Creeps and doesn't take effect on Turrets or Base).
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Masha spends 24% HP to increase her Movement Speed by 60% for 1.5s. She also increases the extra <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> from <font color="a6aafb">Power of the Wild</font> by 3<font color="fba51f"> (+1% Extra Physical Attack)</font>% of the target's Max HP and gains 50% extra Attack Speed for her next two Basic Attacks.

Masha spends 24% HP to roar at enemies, dealing 200<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and reducing their Attack Speed by 50% for 2s.

Masha spends 34% HP to lunge at an enemy hero (immune to control effects during the lunge), dealing 400<font color="fba51f"> (+220% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, slowing them by 25% for 2s, and knocking back nearby enemies. The cooldown of this skill will be reset each time Masha loses an HP bar.

Masha gains Energy when dealing damage to enemies and extra Energy when dealing damage with Wild Power.

After leaving combat for 3s, Masha can activate this skill to spend half a full bar of Energy to recover a full HP bar. Masha is invincible while casting this skill.

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Burst build. Ultimate and enhanced Basic Attack for late game execution.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Basic Attacks slow enemies by <%Num1> and reduce their Attack Speed by <%Num2>.########[8098ab]Duration: <Num3>s[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s (each Basic Attack reduces it by <Num5>s, down to <Num6>s)[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Basic Attacks slow enemies by 50% and reduce their Attack Speed by 30%.

<font color="8098ab">Duration: 1s</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 10s (each Basic Attack reduces it by 1s, down to 3s)</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.

equiplist.equipskill1: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
Punish: Increase damage by 8% against enemy heroes with higher extra HP.
equiplist.equiptips:
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.

recommendmasterplan.name: Chiilstreeam
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

assist.desc: Masha can maximize her effectiveness and damage when paired with utility Supports that provide extra Movement Speed and CC, such as Angela and Rafaela.

strong.desc: Masha works well against Marksmen with low mobility, such as Ixia and Layla, as she can easily chase them down using her Ultimate.

weak.desc: Masha is countered by Fighters with strong Regen capabilities like Cici and Thamuz, because they can outlast Masha in a prolonged fight due to her comparatively lower Regen.
